item.title: About
item.description:
I am a cybersecurity student at Sapienza University of Rome.

I attended the cyberchallenge.it 2024 national program and was able to qualify for the finals in Turin with Universit√† di Roma Tor Vergata.

Currently developing a master thesis on the LLVM compiler with particular focus on profile guided optimization under the supervision of Prof. Daniele Cono D’Elia.
